mapper.sql: wodor.despatch_order_re_jo_id, wodor.despatch_order_id, wodor.job_order_id, wodor.status, wodor.remark, wodor.org_id, wodor.create_user_id, wodor.create_time, wodor.modified_user_id, wodor.modified_time, wodor.is_delete
mapper.select:
SELECT ,wijo.order_status,bmo.material_owner_name,bw.warehouse_name,wijo.job_order_code,wijo.related_order_code, (select sum(det.actual_qty) from wms_inner_job_order_det det where det.job_order_id=wijo.job_order_id) as actual_qty, wodo.consignee as consignee_name,wodo.link_man_name,wodo.link_man_phone,wodo.fax_number,wodo.e_mail_address,wodo.detailed_address, su.user_name AS create_user_name,sus.user_name AS modified_user_name,bo.organization_name AS organization_Name FROM wms_out_despatch_order_re_jo wodor LEFT JOIN wms_inner_job_order wijo ON wodor.job_order_id = wijo.job_order_id LEFT JOIN base_material_owner bmo ON wijo.material_owner_id=bmo.material_owner_id LEFT JOIN base_warehouse bw ON wijo.warehouse_id = bw.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN wms_out_delivery_order wodo ON wijo.source_order_id = wodo.delivery_order_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user su ON wodor.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user sus ON wodor.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON wodor.org_id = bo.organization_id
and wodor.despatch_order_id = #{despatchOrderId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wms_in_asn_order WHERE source_order_id=#{sourceOrderId} AND order_type_id=#{orderTypeId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wms_in_asn_order WHERE source_order_id=#{sourceOrderId} AND order_type_id=#{orderTypeId} and order_status=6
mapper.update: update wms_out_delivery_order set order_status=#{orderStatus} where delivery_order_id=#{deliveryOrderId}
